Package ca.uqac.lif.cep.peg

Core functions and processors to compute trends over a stream of events.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ChoiceFunction<Q,R>
    Choice function - takes as constructor parameters t, u, base and map.
    ContextRef<Q,R>
    Group processor which generalizes the TrendDistance processor.
    JaccardIndex
    Computes the Jaccard index of two collections.
    Main
    A "dummy" main class; it is only there to make the generated JAR runnable from the command line.
    MapDistance
    Computes the distance between two maps.
    MapDistance.ToValueArray
    From an array whose keys are strings, extracts a list of values, placed in increasing key order.
    Normalize
    Normalizes a collection of numbers
    PointDistance
    Computes a distance metric over two n-dimensional points.
    PredictedTrendDistance  
    PredictedTrendDistance.PredictorGroup  
    SecondOrderTrendDistance
    This processor class extends GroupProcessors.
    SelfCorrelatedTrendDistance<P,Q,R>
    Compares a trend calculated on a window events to another trend computed on another window placed further away in the past.
    Sequence<S>
    Representation of a finite stream of events of a specific type.
    SetPointDistance
    Computes the distance between two sets of points.
    TrendDistance<P,Q,R>
    Processor that evaluates in real-time whether a trend computed over an input event stream is "close enough" to a reference trend.
    VectorDistance
    Computes a distance metric between two numerical vectors.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    PatException
    Generic exception raised by the use of the library

Package ca.uqac.lif.cep.peg Description

Core functions and processors to compute trends over a stream of events.
